description.value: Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc's own blood. All animal companions, pets, familiars, and bonded animals you have gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Orc Ferocity] feat, and gain one reaction per round they can use only for Orc Ferocity. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Undying Ferocity] ancestry feat, all animal companions, pets, familiars, and bonded animals you have also gain the benefits of that feat when using the Orc Ferocity reaction.

value.value: animal companion, Pet, or Bonded Animal
